unittitle_ssm: Lloyd Trufelman Collection on Artists' Television Network
abstract_ssm: Lloyd Trufelman was active in the Downtown New York City experimental arts scene in the 1970s and 1980s, and worked with Jaime Davidovich as part of the Artists' Television Network. This collection (dated 1979-1980) consists of materials collected by Trufelman documenting the activities of the Artists' Television Network (ATN). Materials include postcards featuring art by Jaime Davidovich; press releases for "Shock Opera," a mixed media work performed by ATN, Hurrah, and Youthinasia; and a copy of Video magazine featuring an article on Davidovich, ATN, and video artists more generally.
subject_ssm: Artists and community -- New York (State) -- New York
collection_ssm: Lloyd Trufelman Collection on Artists' Television Network
